page.title: 14A Day In The Life Of N & M
page.content:
NICOLA (AGE 10)- Up at 7.00 a.m. get dressed, have breakfast, went to school. First lesson swimming, 9.45-10.35, playtime 10.35-10.55, finishing off lesson till 12 noon. Dinner at 12. Maths with Mrs. Child, last lesson 3.00 p.m., home at 3.50. Had tea at 4.30, went to the animals at 5.15, home by 9.30.
MATTHEW (AGE 10)- Up at 7.05 a.m., set off to school at 8.12, arrive there at 8.27 and go in at 8.55. Swimming 9.45-10.35, playtime 10.35-10.55, work until 12 noon. Dinner and play 12 -1.15p.m. Went to computer room. 2.25 went out to play, came in and did work at.2.43. Went home at 3.50, watched TV at 4.25, had dinner at 5.15 and went to bed at 11.0 p.m.
